title: Seasonally appropriate 1-in-30 million orange-and-black lobster caught by Gloucester fisherman
author: Madison Lucchesi
bullets: Local News The lobster is named Jackie after a Jack O'Lantern.
Jackie, one in 30 million calico lobsters, is the newest addition to Northeastern’s Marine Science Center.
Alyssa Stone/Northeastern University A Gloucester fisherman caught 1-in-30-million orange-and-black lobster.

title: A New England city is the safest in the country, says WalletHub study. (No, not Boston.)

bullets: Local News Though Boston ranked 31st on WalletHub’s 2025 list, it outpaced other large U.
S.
cities.

title: ‘He was crazy’: Fall River suspect charged after allegedly stabbing ex-mayor in the neck
author: Abby Patkin
bullets: Crime Fall River police said Corree Gonzales appeared “mentally deranged” as officers attempted to question him about the violent attack.
Former Fall River Mayor William Flanagan in 2010.

Debee Tlumacki for the Boston Globe, File By Abby Patkin October 23, 2025 | 11:00 AM 2 minutes to read The man charged with stabbing former Fall River Mayor Will Flanagan will undergo further psychiatric evaluation after authorities said he appeared “mentally deranged” as officers attempted to question him about the violent attack.

title: State Farm Insurance is expanding into Massachusetts
author: Beth Treffeisen
bullets: Business The nation's largest auto and home insurance company hopes to make plans available in the Bay State by 2027.
Jaylen Brown dunks the ball in the 2024 AT&T Slam Dunk contest during the State Farm All-Star Saturday Night last winter.
State Farm plans to expand into Massachusetts in 2027.

title: Hall of Fame QB discussed the ‘next step’ for Drake Maye’s development
author: Hayden Bird
bullets: Morning Sports Update "There's room to grow, and there's more out there for him that will make the game easier on him.
" Drake Maye during the Patriots' win over the Titans.

AP Photo/John Amis By Hayden Bird October 23, 2025 | 10:41 AM 3 minutes to read Drake Maye analysis: Patriots quarterback Drake Maye has been one of the storylines of the NFL through seven weeks, as the 23-year-old has guided New England to a 5-2 record while playing an effective and efficient brand of football.

title: Wakefield man stabbed woman with box cutter at Boston mall, police say
author: Madison Lucchesi
bullets: Crime Christopher Baez, 36, was charged following the alleged attack at South Bay Center.
South Bay Center in 2018.
Jonathan Wiggs/The Boston Globe A Wakefield man stabbed a woman with a box cutter at South Bay Center in Dorchester on Tuesday, police say.
